sentences.en: Commit to give up attachment to self - defeating beliefs that sabotage your performance.
sentences.cn: 承诺对旧我的放弃 —— 所有时时刻刻操纵你、摧毁你实现目标的思想和信念.

sentences.en: Every single plane had been sabotaged.
sentences.cn: 每架飞机都遭到了破坏。

sentences.en: He said that the opposition had done everything possible to sabotage the elections.
sentences.cn: 他说对手已经使出一切可能的手段来破坏选举。

sentences.en: It is clear to me now that Sammy Tyler is trying to sabotage the contract negotiations.
sentences.cn: 我现在已经看得很清楚,萨米·泰勒想破坏我们的合同.

sentences.en: My insurance excludes acts of sabotage and damage done by weapons of war.
sentences.cn: 我购买的保险对于蓄意损坏以及战争中武器造成的损坏不予赔偿。

sentences.en: One of the journalists queried whether sabotage could have been involved.
sentences.cn: 其中一位新闻记者询问是否有人为破坏的可能性。

sentences.en: The award was given for sabotage activities behind enemy lines.
sentences.cn: 是为了褒奖我在敌后的破坏工作.

sentences.en: The bombing was a spectacular act of sabotage.
sentences.cn: 这场轰炸是一次大规模的蓄意破坏行为。

sentences.en: The fire at the factory was caused by sabotage.
sentences.cn: 那家工厂的火灾是有人蓄意破坏引起的.

sentences.en: The police were sure it was a care of sabotage.
sentences.cn: 警方认定那是一件怠工案.

sentences.en: The railway lines into Russia, carrying vital military supplies, were key targets for German sabotage.
sentences.cn: 通往俄国的铁路运送着重要的军用物资, 因此成了德国人破坏的主要目标.

sentences.en: The terrorists were planning acts of sabotage to destabilize the country.
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子在策划破坏国家安定的行动。

sentences.en: Their sabotage put back production badly.
sentences.cn: 他们的破坏严重影响了生产.

sentences.en: They tried to sabotage my birthday party.
sentences.cn: 他们企图破坏我的生日晚会.

sentences.en: They tried to sabotage my party by getting drunk.
sentences.cn: 他们想藉耍酒疯来破坏我的宴会.

sentences.en: They underwent courses in radio communication, demolition, and sabotage.
sentences.cn: 他们接受了无线电通信 、 拆毁和破坏的课程.

sentences.en: Was the fire an accident or ( an act of ) sabotage?
sentences.cn: 这场大火是意外事故还是有人破坏?

trans.tran_en: deliberate damage that is done to equipment, vehicles etc in order to prevent an enemy or opponent from using them

trans.tran_cn: 蓄意破坏，怠工，对…采取破坏行动，捣乱
trans.tran_en: to secretly damage or destroy equipment, vehicles etc that belong to an enemy or opponent, so that they cannot be used
